introduction.section1: Among the countless islands of Indonesia, Bali is the most famous. Located in the Southeast Islands, between Java and Lombok, it is part of a group of islands called the Lesser Sunda Islands.
introduction.section2: During the day, enjoy and rest on the immense beaches, or admire the landscapes in front of you, with rice terraces and impressive volcanoes. At night, Bali transforms into a party island, with its bars open all night long. Day and night, Bali is a crazy island.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Bali
meta-description: During the day, enjoy and rest on the immense beaches, or admire the landscapes in front of you, with rice terraces and impressive volcanoes. At night, Bali transforms into a party island, with its bars open all night long. Day and night, Discover this crazy island. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
